main event: A witness observed a spherical-shaped orange object in the sky traveling at high speed in Norman, Oklahoma in 1967.
interesting points: The object was approximately one-eighth the size of the moon,The sighting lasted for about 6-7 minutes,The object traveled west at approximately 2500 MPH, Eyewitness estimate of the object's speed was 90 miles per hour, The event might have been mistaken for a weather balloon, though no evidence confirmed that.
